message: Fair and simple split, let's get started!
You wanted a fair split, now it's my turn to propose a more reasonable offer!
I'm willing to compromise, but I still want a decent share!
You're being too greedy, I'll give you a small share, but I'm taking the majority!
I'm willing to give up some, but I still want a decent share!
You're not budging, so I'll take the lion's share and leave you with scraps!
Let's split it 50/50, it's the fairest way!
